entry.title: RailTel Secures Rs 14.40 Crore Order from Ministry of External Affairs for AI-Enabled Laptops
entry.content:
Top News
RailTel Secures Rs 14.40 Crore Order from Ministry of External Affairs for AI-Enabled Laptops 1 hour ago
RailTel Corporation of India has won an international order worth Rs 14,40,41,500 from the Ministry of External Affairs for the procurement and supply of 2000 AI-enabled laptops. As the Project Implementing Agency, RailTel is tasked with executing the project by March 4, 2026. This order demonstrates RailTel's expanding role in technology-driven government projects and its capability to handle large-scale, complex IT procurement tasks.

entry.title: Genus Power Promoters Update Share Encumbrance Disclosure
entry.content:
Genus Power Promoters Update Share Encumbrance Disclosure 2 hours ago
Genus Power Infrastructures promoters have submitted a revised disclosure on share encumbrance as per SEBI regulations. The update names Gemview Investment Pte. Ltd. as the entity in whose favor shares are encumbered. The disclosure covers promoter entities including Kailash Chandra Agarwal and family members, though specific share numbers are not provided.

entry.title: Ceinsys Tech Seeks NSE Listing to Broaden Investor Base and Enhance Visibility
entry.content:
Ceinsys Tech Seeks NSE Listing to Broaden Investor Base and Enhance Visibility 41 minutes ago
Ceinsys Tech Limited, currently listed on BSE, has applied for listing on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) on December 6, 2025. The company's financial position shows significant year-over-year improvements. Total assets increased by 77.15% to ₹577.70 crore, current assets grew by 94.71% to ₹445.70 crore, total equity rose by 75.95% to ₹411.90 crore, and fixed assets expanded by 82.23% to ₹80.00 crore. The NSE listing aims to widen investor participation and improve visibility of the company's equity shares.

entry.title: ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position
entry.content:
ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position 5 hours ago
ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company has set the price band for its initial public offering at ₹2,061 to ₹2,165 per equity share, with a minimum bid lot of 6 shares. The company's financial data shows growth, with total assets increasing by 5.22% to ₹308,847.00 crore and investments growing by 4.92% to ₹304,054.00 crore over the past year. The IPO is expected to attract significant investor interest due to the company's strong market position in India's asset management industry.
